short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate design experience with ColorFont Master - the essential Chrome extension for seamless color and font handling. Install now!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the full potential of web design with ColorFont Master, a powerful Chrome extension designed for creatives, developers, and design enthusiasts. This feature-rich extension seamlessly integrates into your browsing experience, providing essential tools for working with colors and fonts on the web.

Key Features:

Eyedropper Tool:

Instantly capture the color of any element on a webpage with our intuitive Eyedropper tool.
Effortlessly pick colors from images, backgrounds, or any design element, and copy the color code to your clipboard.

Font Identifier:

Explore the world of typography with our Font Identifier feature.
Identify and preview fonts used on any webpage with a single click.
Uncover the styling secrets of text elements to inspire and inform your own design choices.

User-Friendly Interface:

Seamlessly access ColorFont Master from your Chrome toolbar for quick and convenient usage.
Intuitive design ensures a user-friendly experience, making it easy for both beginners and seasoned designers to harness its capabilities.
Customization and Personalization:

Tailor the extension to your workflow with customizable settings.
Adjust preferences, such as the display of color codes or the format of font identification results, to match your design preferences.

Efficient Workflows:

Streamline your design workflows by eliminating the need for external tools.
Enhance productivity by having color and font information at your fingertips without leaving your browser.

Privacy and Security:

ColorFont Master prioritizes user privacy and operates in accordance with Chrome extension security guidelines.
No unnecessary data is collected, ensuring a secure and reliable extension experience.

Get Started Today:
Elevate your web design capabilities with ColorFont Master. Whether you're a web designer, developer, or anyone passionate about aesthetics, this extension is your go-to tool for mastering colors and fonts on the web.

Install ColorFont Master now and transform the way you design and create on the web!
